alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Castle Country; Central Mountains; San Rafael Swell; Southern Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 12:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT NORTH CENTRAL WAYNE...EMERY... SOUTHEASTERN SEVIER AND CARBON COUNTIES... At 1221 PM MDT...A snow squall was along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Price to 18 miles north of Torrey...and moving east at 30 mph. Locations impacted include... Price, Helper, Huntington, Wellington, Sunnyside, Clawson, Castle Dale, Ferron, Orangeville, East Carbon, Cleveland, Elmo, Emery, Goblin Valley, Molen, Moore, Kenilworth and Woodside. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 92 and 146. US Route 6 between mile markers 230 and 288. Utah Route 10 between mile markers 12 and 68. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 121 and 132. * winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this squall. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this squall. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
